summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Mr. Pristine Organic Beard Shampoo with Natural Essential Oils for Moisturizing Skin & Hair, 8.5 oz.
Review Date: 2020/09/07
Store: Mr. Pristine
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mr. Pristine', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Hair Type': 'Color Treated', 'Scent': 'Peppermint', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '5.21 x 2.8 x 2.3 inches; 7.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '627843801832', 'Manufacturer': 'Mr. Pristine'}
Review Text: This is a really nice shampoo specifically designed for your beard. It has a nice minty smell that doesn't over power and leaves your beard and skin feeling soft and smelling good. Also,grab their conditioner. I recommend this to anyone with a beard. Notable upgrade from traditional soap or shampoo.
Review Title: Great stuff for your beard.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Mr. Pristine Organic Beard Conditioner to Grow, Thicken, Moisturize and Protect Your Beard, 8.5 oz.
Review Date: 2020/09/07
Store: Mr. Pristine
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mr. Pristine', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Dry', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '8.5 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '3.1 x 2.5 x 2.36 inches; 7.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '627843801825', 'Manufacturer': 'Mr. Pristine'}
Review Text: This is a really nice conditioner specifically designed for your beard. I recommend starting with Mr.. Pristine's shampoo first. It has a nice minty smell that doesn't over power and leaves your beard and skin feeling soft and smelling good. I recommend this to anyone with a beard.
Review Title: Highly recommend. Buy their shampoo as well.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Hyaluronic Acid Serum for face - 11% Low molecules Anti-aging Hydrating Booster Serum 100% Pure Hyaluronic Acid
Review Date: 2020/09/26
Store: MEAROSA DESIGN
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'MEAROSA DESIGN', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Product Dimensions': '1.77 x 1.77 x 3.94 inches; 4.3 Ounces', 'UPC': '628504326121'}
Review Text: I really like this hyaluronic acid serum. It absorbs easily and leaves your skin feeling moisturized and tight. I also like the pump as opposed to eye dropper for application. If you need a good serum at a good price, this is a great choice.
Review Title: Highly recommend.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: EASYDEW Repair Control Renewal Intensive Moisture 1.69 fl oz - Rapid Wrinkle Care with Human Epidermal Growth Factor I For Dry to Sensitive Skin I Nourishing & Instant Hydration with Ceramide NP
Review Date: 2020/11/05
Store: EASYDEW
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 1.7 x 1.7 inches; 3.21 Ounces'}
Review Text: This is a tough one for me. This moisturizer is reasonably lightweight and makes my skin look nice. However, it takes a long time for my skin to absorb fully. Maybe thats part of the repair function? Not sure. Anyway, as such, I recommend this lotion but, if you have the same experience,  make it a night time lotion. Let it work itself in while you sleep!
Review Title: Good but slow absorption.
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Rose Quartz Roller with Derma Roller Kit, Microneedling Face Roller 0.25mm and Body Microneedle Roller 0.3mm
Review Date: 2020/11/23
Store: LOLYSENTA
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.95 x 6.54 x 1.81 inches; 12.63 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LS10', 'UPC': '019213737276', 'Manufacturer': 'Lolysenta'}
Review Text: Great value kit. My wife is a giant fan of micro needling and rollers. She found this kit to be on par or better than some of the more expensive kits she has used. Good buy.
Review Title: Solid value.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Swiss Botany Pueraria Mirifica Breast Lifters for Women - Breast Enlargement Serum with Pure Pueraria Mirifica Oil for Breast Firming, Lifting and Fuller, Bigger Breast - Large 2oz Bottle
Review Date: 2021/06/08
Store: Swiss Botany
Average Rating: 3.1
Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '2 x 3 x 4 inches; 2 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Swiss Botany'}
Review Text: So, this is nice and moisturizing but, for $60, I assume you are paying for some perkiness too. First of all, my wife ordered this accidentally but we kept it and she has used it for the last 2 weeks. As you might have guessed, she isn't suddenly perkier. Her words, not mine!!! Anyway, I am going to say save your money here and pass.
Review Title: If you are dubious of the claims, you should be.
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details:

        1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked.

        2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked.

        3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects.

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user expresses significant satisfaction with the beard care products, noting their pleasant minty scent and their effectiveness in moisturizing and softening the beard and skin. High recommendations reflect enthusiasm for the organic beard shampoo and conditioner, highlighting their specific design for beard care and overall quality. Additionally, the hyaluronic acid serum is appreciated for its easy absorption and skin-tightening effects, with users valuing the practical pump applicator for convenience. The value received from the microneedling kit is also recognized, with comparisons favoring it against more expensive alternatives, affirming effective use by a family member.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
There are notable concerns regarding the moisturizer's slow absorption rate, with the user suggesting it might be more suitable for nighttime use. This experience indicates that while the product works well, it may not meet expectations for immediate results. The most significant disappointment arises from the breast enlargement serum, which the user described as ineffective despite being marketed for enhancing perkiness. They express frustration over the high price for minimal perceived benefits, leading to a strong recommendation against purchasing this item.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user's purchase history reveals a mix of positive and negative experiences. Strong praise surrounds the beard care products and hyaluronic acid serum, showcasing their effectiveness, pleasant scents, and functionality. Conversely, issues with the absorption of a moisturizer and dissatisfaction with the serum marketed for breast enhancement illustrate areas needing improvement. While the user is generally supportive of the high-quality products, they remain critical of any items that fail to deliver on their promises, particularly when premium pricing is involved.

target_interaction.title: Good moisturizing eye cream.
target_interaction.text: I like this eye cream. I use a lot of them and this stuff is among the better at actually moisturizing. I don't see a ton of wrinkle repair but half the battle is keeping that part of your face moisturizer. You get a big tube for the price so it will last. Recommend.
target_interaction.title_meta: facetheory Ocuwake Eye Cream EYE1 - Eye Cream For Dark Circles And Puffiness, Vitamin C Eye Brightening Cream, Vegan and Cruelty-Free, Made in the UK | Unfragranced | 1.0 fl oz
features: [ Anti Wrinkle Eye Cream ] Help reduce the appearance of wrinkles and eye bags with Meiview, which encourages the production of collagen I, targeting loss of elasticity, leaving skin smoother.
[ Vegan Eye Repair Cream ] Powerful actives like chamomile extract and argan oil, Ocuwake Eye Cream is formulated to firm the eye contour and protect elasticity, reducing the appearance of eye bags.
[ Eye Cream For Dark Circles and Puffiness ] By inhibiting melanin production, Hexylresorcinol helps to reduce the appearance of undereye dark circles and puffiness in the under-eye area.
[ Lightweight Texture ] Can be used morning and night, apply a small amount after cleansing under eyes with a gentle tapping motion. A fast-absorbing formula that can be worn alone or under makeup.
[ Cruelty-Free & Manufactured in the UK ] Facetheory is Leaping Bunny-certified cruelty-free. Our products contain no parabens, silicones, PEGS, SLS, SLES, or mineral oils.
